glsa.title: Ruby-GNOME2: Format string error
glsa.synopsis: A format string error has been discovered in Ruby-GNOME2, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Ruby-GNOME2 is a set of bindings for using GTK+ within the Ruby programming language.

description.p: Chris Rohlf discovered that the "Gtk::MessageDialog.new()" method in the file gtk/src/rbgtkmessagedialog.c does not properly sanitize the "message" parameter before passing it to the gtk_message_dialog_new() function.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted string to an application using Ruby-GNOME2, possibly leading to the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
